com.kibeacon.sdk

Class KibeaconAdvertisingInterval

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kibeacon.sdk.KibeaconAdvertisingInterval

  • public class KibeaconAdvertisingInterval
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines allowed advertising interval. Allowed advertising interval: 50, 100, 200, 500, 1000, 2000, 5000 (in ms)
